input.sentences: the slumber party was kicked off by the hostess striking a pose to indicate that this was going to be a fun night .
first up was a game of twister !
next | there was a big pillow fight where it was girls vs. boys .
this poor guy could n't believe he got beaten by a girl ; he thought the guys would surely win .
the girls celebrate their victory in front of the fireplace and get ready for bed .

some of her friends are not the best players
